entities.name: neville longbottom

entities.name: ginny

entities.name: remembrall
entities.description: The Remembrall is mentioned as an object that Neville's grandmother sent him to improve his memory.

relationships.description: Ginny corrects Neville's statement that he is nobody.
Harry remembers the Remembrall that Neville's grandmother sent him.
Luna is a member of Ravenclaw house.
